Beliefs & Emotions
  • Ztree Summary
  • Belief Stage
    • Emotions Summary
    • Regressions - Period beliefs as a function of subjects' average emotions
    • Regressions - Period beliefs as a function of Period and Market trends (without emotions)
    • Regressions - Period beliefs as a function of Period and Market trends (with emotions)
    • Regressions - Upcoming period beliefs as a function of subjects' average emotions
    • Regressions - Upcoming period beliefs as a function of subjects' average emotions - percentage difference
    • Regressions - Percision in beliefs as a function of subjects' average emotions
    • Relationship between predicted and actual price change between periods t-1 and t
    • Beliefs as a function of fundamental value
    • Long term beliefs using record stage emotions of t-1
    • Short term beliefs using record stage emotions of t-1
    • b(t) - b(t-1) regression
  • Record Stage
    • Emotions Summary
    • Regressions - Percision in beliefs as a function of subjects' average emotions
    • Regressions - Total dividends received as a function of subjects' average emotions (traders only)
    • Regression - Protfolio value as a function of subjects' average emotions (Traders only)

Regressions results - Long term beliefs

(Using previous record stage emotions)

\(LTB_{i,t} = \frac{1}{(T-t)} \sum_{k=1}^{T-t} \frac{B_{i,t}^{t+k} - f_{t+k}}{f_{t+k}}\)

\(LTB_{i,t} = C_{i} + \beta_1Periodtrend + \beta_2Markettrend + \beta_3Neutrality_{i,t-1} + \beta_4Happiness_{i,t-1} + \beta_5Sadness_{i,t-1} + \beta_6Anger_{i,t-1} + \beta_7Surprise_{i,t-1} + \beta_8Fear_{i,t-1} + \beta_9Disgust_{i,t-1}\)

\(LTB_{i,t} = C_{i} + \beta_1Neutrality_{i,t-1} + \beta_2Happiness_{i,t-1} + \beta_3Sadness_{i,t-1} + \beta_4Anger_{i,t-1} + \beta_5Surprise_{i,t-1} + \beta_6Fear_{i,t-1} + \beta_7Disgust_{i,t-1}\)

(Fixed effects regression model) (Periods 2-14 only)
